website_summaries.verdict: An excellent cleaver made of quality materials that will last.
pros: Multipurpose Chinese style chef knife great for cutting all types of meat
Comfortable to hold with a good, balanced weight
Made of German steel with a full tang
cons: A little pricier than other brands, but worth it for the quality

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heft and balance. Awesome cutting device
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cleaver and had it for more than a month. Had used it quite a few times and find myself enjoying using it. Mostly I use it to slice vegetables and it did an excellent job. I was able to make very thin slices of Roma tomatoes to serve with hamburgers I was making. It slices onions with no problems. This cleaver has excellent weight and balance. So far it has kept its sharpness. It has become my go to knife!
customer_reviews.author: psat

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: "Great knife for the money! If yer gonna spend time in the kitchen a great knife is always your friend." Works well on anything, meats, cutting up whole chickens, veggies, you name it. Doubles as a hand to hand combat weapon too! lol j/k
customer_reviews.author: JEFF H

customer_reviews.title: Should call it a klife or a neaver -W-O-W!
customer_reviews.text: Best combo cleaver knife I have used. Well balanced. Super sharp. Won't be hacking through bones with it, but a perfect aid for grinding meat. Chopping chunks goes faster than slicing them. But if you do have to slice or cut something, no need to change knives. Blade is wide enough to assist in scooping/scraping cut chunks from cutting board into your other hand. Only thing I can't comment on is durability of edge as I have only used it once. Tore through 10 lbs. of meat in minutes. Will keep you posted about durability. So far though, a winner!
customer_reviews.author: ak-holic

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good value here.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cleaver so I gave this one a shot. Came extremely sharp out of the box and is holding its edge surprisingly well. Good weight very comfortable. Shockingly good value. I’m going to have to look at the rest of their lineup.
customer_reviews.author: Tyronne E. Doram

customer_reviews.title: This thing is beautiful and superior quality.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I was so impressed with everything about this knife ... Even the 1st impressions from the gorgeous packaging. Every detail amazed me. It is beautiful to look at, it is comfortable to wield and it is super strong and sharp. The steel is very high quality, the full tang design makes it durable and the edge can chop anything like butter. The grip does not get slippery and maked meal prep a breeze without worrying about slipping. I absolutely love this knife!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Knife
customer_reviews.text: Packaging of this knife is second to none. If they care that much about packaging, you know they put way more into the product. Knife has a very balanced feel and comfortable handle. A well polished blade with an extremely sharp edge. It will literally shave hair right out of the box. Zelite has knocked it out of the park with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: The Zelite knife I’d bad item , don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: The knife is not good! It is on warranty, I needs another replacement,it is chipped
customer_reviews.author: Kyle  Doan Ngo

customer_reviews.title: It clevers
customer_reviews.text: This meat clever does cut through bones pretty nicely, and anything else that's a little thicker, but it doesn't hold an edge for as long as I'd like it to. This isn't abnormal for meat clevers, because you are going through bone with it, but it could be better. The handle does feel good in your hand and the blade is nice and wide for ultimate scooping power
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weig

customer_reviews.title: Be careful handling its sharp and cuts you
customer_reviews.text: Definitely the sharpest knife we have bought yet. My husband loves this product. He was complaining how it’s difficult to cut poultry and i had to search for the best one and found this. Price is reasonable definitely feels pricey but the packaging adds more quality to it.
customer_reviews.author: Riza khanal

customer_reviews.title: Nice cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: Knife is a birthday gift for my husband....delivered in an Amazon box and inside was a very nicely packaged 7" cleaver. A lot of weight to it. We've had it for just a few days so haven't used it much. My husband likes the weight, the grip and the rocking edge (curved and not flat) I wish it came with a storage guard. It is easy to clean, just be wary since its so sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Marmalady Midge

customer_reviews.title: Incredible piece of kitchenware
customer_reviews.text: The cleaver itself is really impressive. This is not your butcher's 12" monster but is perfect for any enthusiastic home-chef. The packaging is also really elegant and would make a great gift as well, but for me, was a gift to myself :)
customer_reviews.author: Patxi

customer_reviews.title: ... knife when I chopped chicken it banded that’s really disappoint me
customer_reviews.text: I paid a lot for this knife when I chopped chicken it banded that’s really disappoint me
customer_reviews.author: rajesh

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool at a competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: As a Chinese Cleaver this is, of course, a specialty knife. If you are serious about preparing food, it needs to be one of your tools. It has the appropriate heft and sharpness. It is very attractive with a great handle. Very competitive price. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife!
customer_reviews.text: The people that gave this knife a bad review do not know how to use a knife. I've been cooking professionally for 25 years and have used a lot of knives. 15 years ago a knife of this quality would've been priced around $80 or $90. One review stated it doesn't hold an edge...learn to use a steel dude.
customer_reviews.author: D. belhumeur

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Balanced
customer_reviews.text: Although I've had dozens of quality knives over the years, this is my first cleaver and I couldn't be more pleased. The balance and weight are such that you don't get worn out if you are using the chopping block for a long period of time. I've used it for cutting/preparing smoked pork butt roasts and whole smoked chickens (with bones) ... the results were very satisfying. I highly recommend this knife and I will definitely purchase another should the need arise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not anything special and not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited while anticipating the delivery but it was really disappointing when I opened it. First, I thought it was taller like a normal Chinese knife but it’s only 8.5 cm tall. Second, the description states “German carbon steel” but it was made in the PRC. Lastly, the steel is not that thick and I could buy the same knife at IKEA for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo Man

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first meat cleaver and I can't imagine a better one. I needed one to chop whole chickens as well as cuts of beef. This does the job like magic. It slices through chicken bones like they were butter. I was concerned the cleaver would be too large for to me handle because I have small hands but the cleaver is so well crafted that I can easily manage it. Excellent and beautiful product. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: dlj

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Great knife, worth the cost. Blade is strong and sharp, with a strong handle too. Excellent for chopping meat. This knife is worth it, especially if you cut meat regularly.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherDude

customer_reviews.title: Elegant & Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I bought this to mince some pork shoulder for meatballs and it did a great job. I’m a short female and the handle felt great & secure in my hand. No fear of slippage. This was a worry for me as I had never used a clever previously. Its an elegant blade but definitely sharp so be aware!
customer_reviews.author: puffin stuff

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: This is a 5 star knife for a 3 star knife price! I've had it almost a year. I don't use it daily but 1 to 4 times a week. And it is still RAZOR sharp. I cut meat, chop and slice veggies; it is my go to for most cutting. Did I mention sharp? Because it is. And it holds the edge.
customer_reviews.author: jim d.

customer_reviews.title: Beauty combined with performance is A grade!
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful kitchen tool! Well made, comfortable and easy to control tang. It is packaged and presented like the manufacturer takes great pride in their product. Bottom line it's a great chefs tool in preparing food and I am extremely pleased with the performance, beauty and shipment. Great job Zelite! I will be a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Buono

customer_reviews.title: Dented easily. Go to your local Asian market for a better quality knife
customer_reviews.text: First time chopping a pork bone, this knife was dented. I wonder if this is really made from high carbon steel. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a knife!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing a well known chef say she loved using a cleaver to cut up even vegetables. I order this and was so pleasantly surprised. Not only is it a great knife, but it was presented beautifully in a box. This would make a great reasonably priced gift for someone who likes to cook.
customer_reviews.author: NCS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product , better than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife! Easy to hold, nice balance. Super sharp! The blade is tight, doesn't have any bounce back due to its weight. Really enjoy using it.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: A work of Art.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly crafted,full tang,aesthetically beautiful.Nice heft.Time will tell how stainless it is.Elegant packaging.
customer_reviews.author: david bytheway

customer_reviews.title: Fits comfortably in your hand
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, extremely sharp, just the right size cleaver for fruits and vegetables and meats. Fits comfortably in your hand, i would absolutely buy this again. Order one and you will be happy you did !
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hayes

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT KNIFE
customer_reviews.text: item arrive in perfect condition, excellent built quality, after a few days of use, i could feel that this knife will serve me well, for this quality, i will buy again in the future. thanks
customer_reviews.author: CONLEY C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: Have just begun cooking with a wok. As a guy what is more fun than fire and having a great knife. The heft, balance, ergonomics and blade quality makes this my first choice on all cutting, slicing, and chopping tasks. Loved my Wustof knife but I use it much less often since getting the Zelite. You will not be sorry for getting this ....and the customer service was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: brad heinz

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Cleaver, Well Balanced and perfect weight. I use it to cut up whole chicken fryers, makes it easy and fast. The thought put into the packaging is incredible. I will be buying more of these as gifts for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: DDS76

customer_reviews.title: Love it.!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, slices very nice. Well packaged. Feels good in the hand, good weight. Lets see it stands up to time.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, High-Quality Cleaver!
customer_reviews.text: "Arrived quickly and very well packaged! Feels like a high quality cleaver that's comfortable to handle and cuts cleanly. Most importantly, my mom loves using it too! :D"
customer_reviews.author: Eva B

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves his knife he uses it for everything I mean everything he just wants to cut and slice..
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Grey

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent packaging and light weight... it’s very sharp and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite knife. I will bust it out to cut basically anything. Its sharp with good weight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Just got my cleaver today, love the looks and the construction, VERY SHARP. I’ve only used it a couple of times, but so far it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: John T

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great second knife
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been cooking for 10 years, I can say with certainty that this knife is incredible. This is the first time I’ve ever spent more than $20 on my cooking utensils. I see a vast improvement in my cutting preparation when I am using this tool. It’s a great second knife.
customer_reviews.author: leon riquelme

customer_reviews.title: Why haven’t I owned one of these til now?
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, super sharp. Had a lot of fun chopping up veggies with this .
customer_reviews.author: Erin W

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Feels great... Bent the blade cutting chicken bones. No kidding. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Everything we had hoped!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is everything we were hoping it would be. It is VERY sharp and very versatile. My wife cooks A LOT, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: James O. Howell

customer_reviews.title: I was extremely happy that I purchased this cleaver knife I could not ...
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy that I purchased this cleaver knife I could not Believe what a great product this is and how inexpensive it was to buy if you’re in the market to buy cleaver knife you owe it to yourself to give this one a try you will not be disappointed ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: Received the cleaver and I am very impressed. Nice and heavy. Well balanced. Fits great in my hand. This one I bought for my friend. I have had mine for 6 months. Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Versatility
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well. Glad I found your knife. Will use it extensively..
customer_reviews.author: Frank P. Vlamings

customer_reviews.title: Like the balance and the sharpness of the blade.
customer_reviews.text: O will use this knife for cutting anything, has excellent balance.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cleaver Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing cleaver. It's well balance and gets the job done with very little effort on my part. I'm very happy that I bought this and would highly recommend it to any home cook.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply one of the best if not the best cleaver I have ever had! From the craftsmanship to the presentation from the company reaching out to me to the way it feels and slices... Did I mention how nicely presented it was?
customer_reviews.author: John Her

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the beautiful cleaver knife I was looking for!!!
customer_reviews.text: "Cleaver knife arrived in perfect condition. This knife is nothing less than absolutely prectacular! We love it! Thank you!"
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Chris Cotner

customer_reviews.title: Added to my Zelite collection
customer_reviews.text: Decided to see if I could use a single cleaver in place of my assortment of kitchen knives (as Chinese cooks often do). Picked Zelite fot the cleaver as the two other knives I have from them have performed well. The verdict i still out on the "single knife" test ...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Quality Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. Knife is made from one piece of metal and is well balanced. The handle is quite comfortable. Excellent job at both chopping and slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Guess what everyone is getting for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this cleaver. Exactly what I wanted. Great craftsmanship, easy to handle. My daughter can use it and is her go to utensil. So versatile. I’m not a professional chef but my friends say I should be. Thanks for putting the love in your products.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy gets all the jobs done! Well packaged and very durable and light!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife it's sharp, ergonomic, and holds it's edge I purchased this knife a couple months ago and wanted to run it through it's paces. High quality stuff I'll buy more knives from this company.
customer_reviews.author: kasey cline

customer_reviews.title: Not working as Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: WORST CLEAVER I EVER HAVE!! I read some good review about this cleaver and decided to give a shot. The first time I am using it today. It broke on the first cleave. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: mayrain319

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Cleaver
customer_reviews.text: I love this Cleaver it looks great as a great weight to it and very sharp
customer_reviews.author: Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: I waited until I actually had an opportunity to use this cleaver/knife. It’s amazing, razor sharp, well balanced and easy to use. I would recommend it to anybody. I’m going to look at some of the other night and I have a huge collection of amazing knives as it is.
customer_reviews.author: matthew s.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and sharp.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a chopping block for meat and it has impressed me. Easy on the wrist and sharp enough. Not as sharp for slicing but can be sharpen for it if needed.
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: Love this knife and makes a great addition to our knives. We use to a lot for our smoked meats!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Radiculously sharp
customer_reviews.text: This is the sharpest knives I've ever used in my life, and I'm a cook. I cut meat like paper.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleaver for the price.
customer_reviews.text: "This cleaver has met my expectations, very sharp and robust, excellent grip on the handle."
customer_reviews.author: Sukaiya

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Good balance and heft. Not overly hard blade steel, but that is better for a cleaver. I will be using it to break down squash this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: you can tell Zelite takes great pride in their product
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous product! The way the cleaver is packed in all the maroon padding, you can tell Zelite takes great pride in their product!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Not for Bone
customer_reviews.text: Great blade for meat and other soft items, don't use for bones. I dented the heck out of the blade cutting baby back ribs.
customer_reviews.author: Horrillo

customer_reviews.title: Well balance and durable
customer_reviews.text: High quality knife - chinese cooking involves the use of chopper to whole chicken and pork leg into pieces. This chopper effortlessly slice through those tasks - well balanced knife.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Y

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and balance makes chopping easy and fun. Performing same job with my older knife was a chore. Impressive packaging and attention to detail.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SINCE MOTHERHOOD AND APPLE PIE
customer_reviews.text: "On time superb quality only need one in a lifetime"

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. A high quality cleaver for our little cooking family! The blade came out of the box sharp as heck, and holds its edge well. It’s also sleak and elegant, as well as easy to handle. Love this knife!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Featherston

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. This was bought as a gift. Knife looks beautiful!! Great packaging, very well protected.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty knife that will take some practice to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty knife that will take some practice to use efficiently. Not as sharp as I thought it would be, but was improved with some honing. Will continue to work with it.

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift which hasn’t yet been opened so I have no idea how good it is.

product_meta.title: Zelite Infinity Cleaver Knife 7 Inch - Comfort-Pro Series - German High Carbon Stainless Steel - Razor Sharp
feature_bullets: BEST IN CLASS: Razor Sharp, Visually Stunning, Satisfying Heft, Premier Meat Cleaver, an ideal Gift for any Home or Professional Kitchen Cook. 7-inch (17.8cm) Multipurpose Chinese Style Chef Knife. Perfect for Cutting, Chopping, Slicing, De Boning, Cleaving Meats, Light Bone, Vegetable, Coconut, Whole Chickens and More with Ruthless Efficiency bringing Excitement back to Cooking. Heavy Duty, yet Solid and Nimble giving You Extreme Cutting Power – give it a try, you will see!

QUALITY GERMAN STEEL: Unlike a lot of the competition who use cheap steels that will rust, dent and wear out, we use ThyssenKrupp High Carbon Stainless Steel X50 Cr MoV 15 which offers Top Lasting Performance, Rust, Corrosion and Stain Resistant that boasts an optimum 56 Rockwell Hardness meaning the Blade is Tough, Hard with Exceptional Edge Retention. Butcher Cleavers / Chopper Cutlery Never Looked or Felt So Good!

EXTREME COMFORT: Full Tang, Ergonomic, Big Forged Rounded Black Handle, Rare Tapered Bolster, Perfect Forward Balance Offering Robustness and Total Control, 7 Inch Cleaver Pro Classic. Just what you’ve been Waiting and Asking for - Comfort and Performance! The Zelite Slicer Asian Style Axe / Butchers Knife – you have to give this a try and experience the Fun and Enjoyment Food Prep becomes!
